alert.note: Alert for Ontario; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 2:57PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Heavy showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Wayne and northeastern Ontario Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 256 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms near Lyons, or 9 miles northwest of Waterloo, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Newark, Lyons, Phelps and West Junius. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
